parameters.name: TenantId
parameters.label: Azure AD Tenant
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
| where Model_s == 'AzureAD'
| distinct TenantGuid_g, Scope_s

content.query:
AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL
| where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId})
| distinct ObjectId_g, ObjectType_s
| summarize count() by ObjectType_s
content.title: Azure AD objects count (today)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL
| where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}) and ObjectType_s == 'User'
| distinct ObjectId_g, ObjectSubType_s
| summarize count() by ObjectSubType_s
content.title: Azure AD users count (today)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
| where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}) and Model_s == 'AzureAD'
| distinct PrincipalId_g, RoleDefinition_s
| summarize count() by RoleDefinition_s
content.title: Azure AD roles count (today)

content.query:
AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
| where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}) and Model_s == 'AzureRM'
| distinct PrincipalId_g, RoleDefinition_s
| summarize count() by RoleDefinition_s
content.title: Azure RM roles count (today)

parameters.name: aadRoleDefinitions
parameters.label: Roles
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and Model_s == 'AzureAD' and TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId})
| distinct RoleDefinition_s
| order by RoleDefinition_s asc

parameters.name: armRoleDefinitions
parameters.label: Roles
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and Model_s in ('AzureRM','AzureClassic') and TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId})
| distinct RoleDefinition_s
| order by RoleDefinition_s asc

paramValidationRules.message: Must be an integer greater than 0
Must be an integer greater than 0

content.query:
let expiryInterval = {ExpirySpan}d;
let AADObjectsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let RBACAssignmentsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let AppsAndKeys = materialize (AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s in ('Application','ServicePrincipal')
| where ObjectSubType_s != 'ManagedIdentity'
| where Keys_s startswith '['
| extend Keys = parse_json(Keys_s)
| project-away Keys_s
| mv-expand Keys
| evaluate bag_unpack(Keys)
| union ( 
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s in ('Application','ServicePrincipal')
    | where ObjectSubType_s != 'ManagedIdentity'
    | where isnotempty(Keys_s) and Keys_s !startswith '['
    | extend Keys = parse_json(Keys_s)
    | project-away Keys_s
    | evaluate bag_unpack(Keys)
)
);
let ExpirationInRisk = AppsAndKeys
| where EndDate < now()+expiryInterval and EndDate > now()
| project ApplicationId_g, KeyId, RiskDate = EndDate;
let NotInRisk = AppsAndKeys
| where EndDate > now()+expiryInterval
| project ApplicationId_g, KeyId, ComfortDate = EndDate;
let ApplicationsInRisk = ExpirationInRisk
| join kind=leftouter ( NotInRisk ) on ApplicationId_g
| where isempty(ComfortDate)
| summarize ExpiresOn = max(RiskDate) by ApplicationId_g;
let ServicePrincipals = materialize(AADObjectsTable
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_g)
| where ObjectType_s == 'ServicePrincipal'
| project SPNId = ObjectId_g, ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s);
let GroupMemberships = AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
| where PrincipalNames_s startswith '['
| extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
| project-away PrincipalNames_s
| mv-expand GroupMember
| union (
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
    | where isnotempty(PrincipalNames_s) and PrincipalNames_s !startswith '['
    | extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
    | project-away PrincipalNames_s
)
| project GroupId = ObjectId_g, GroupName = DisplayName_s, GroupMember = tostring(GroupMember), TenantGuid_g, Cloud_s;
let DirectAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    ServicePrincipals
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.SPNId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = 'Direct', Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
let GroupAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    GroupMemberships
    | join kind=inner ( 
        ServicePrincipals
    ) on $left.GroupMember == $right.SPNId
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.GroupId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = strcat('Group>',GroupName), Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
AppsAndKeys
| join kind=inner (ApplicationsInRisk) on ApplicationId_g
| summarize ExpiresOn = max(EndDate) by ApplicationId_g, DisplayName_s, Cloud_s, KeyType, TenantGuid_g
| join kind=leftouter (
    GroupAssignments
    | union DirectAssignments
) on ApplicationId_g
| summarize countif(isnotempty(RoleDefinition_s)) by DisplayName_s, ExpiresOn, KeyType, TenantGuid_g, ApplicationId_g
| order by countif_ desc, ExpiresOn asc

let expiryInterval = {MinExpirySpan}d;
let AADObjectsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let RBACAssignmentsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let AppsAndKeys = materialize (AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s in ('Application','ServicePrincipal')
| where ObjectSubType_s != 'ManagedIdentity'
| where Keys_s startswith '['
| extend Keys = parse_json(Keys_s)
| project-away Keys_s
| mv-expand Keys
| evaluate bag_unpack(Keys)
| union ( 
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s in ('Application','ServicePrincipal')
    | where ObjectSubType_s != 'ManagedIdentity'
    | where isnotempty(Keys_s) and Keys_s !startswith '['
    | extend Keys = parse_json(Keys_s)
    | project-away Keys_s
    | evaluate bag_unpack(Keys)
)
);
let NotExpiringSoon = AppsAndKeys
| where EndDate > now()+expiryInterval
| project ApplicationId_g, ObjectType_s, DisplayName_s, Cloud_s, KeyType, TenantGuid_g, ExpiresOn = EndDate;
let ServicePrincipals = materialize(AADObjectsTable
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_g)
| where ObjectType_s == 'ServicePrincipal'
| project SPNId = ObjectId_g, ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s);
let GroupMemberships = AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
| where PrincipalNames_s startswith '['
| extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
| project-away PrincipalNames_s
| mv-expand GroupMember
| union (
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
    | where isnotempty(PrincipalNames_s) and PrincipalNames_s !startswith '['
    | extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
    | project-away PrincipalNames_s
)
| project GroupId = ObjectId_g, GroupName = DisplayName_s, GroupMember = tostring(GroupMember), TenantGuid_g, Cloud_s;
let DirectAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    ServicePrincipals
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.SPNId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = 'Direct', Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
let GroupAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    GroupMemberships
    | join kind=inner ( 
        ServicePrincipals
    ) on $left.GroupMember == $right.SPNId
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.GroupId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = strcat('Group>',GroupName), Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
NotExpiringSoon
| join kind=leftouter (
    GroupAssignments
    | union DirectAssignments
) on ApplicationId_g
| summarize countif(isnotempty(RoleDefinition_s)) by DisplayName_s, ExpiresOn, KeyType, TenantGuid_g, ApplicationId_g
| order by countif_ desc, ExpiresOn desc

let AADObjectsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let RBACAssignmentsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let AppsAndKeys = materialize (AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s in ('Application','ServicePrincipal')
| where ObjectSubType_s != 'ManagedIdentity'
| where Keys_s startswith '['
| extend Keys = parse_json(Keys_s)
| project-away Keys_s
| mv-expand Keys
| evaluate bag_unpack(Keys)
| union ( 
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s in ('Application','ServicePrincipal')
    | where ObjectSubType_s != 'ManagedIdentity'
    | where isnotempty(Keys_s) and Keys_s !startswith '['
    | extend Keys = parse_json(Keys_s)
    | project-away Keys_s
    | evaluate bag_unpack(Keys)
)
);
let ExpirationInRisk = AppsAndKeys
| where EndDate < now()
| project ApplicationId_g, KeyId, RiskDate = EndDate;
let NotInRisk = AppsAndKeys
| where EndDate > now()
| project ApplicationId_g, KeyId, ComfortDate = EndDate;
let ApplicationsInRisk = ExpirationInRisk
| join kind=leftouter ( NotInRisk ) on ApplicationId_g
| where isempty(ComfortDate)
| summarize ExpiresOn = max(RiskDate) by ApplicationId_g;
let ServicePrincipals = materialize(AADObjectsTable
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_g)
| where ObjectType_s == 'ServicePrincipal'
| project SPNId = ObjectId_g, ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s);
let GroupMemberships = AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
| where PrincipalNames_s startswith '['
| extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
| project-away PrincipalNames_s
| mv-expand GroupMember
| union (
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
    | where isnotempty(PrincipalNames_s) and PrincipalNames_s !startswith '['
    | extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
    | project-away PrincipalNames_s
)
| project GroupId = ObjectId_g, GroupName = DisplayName_s, GroupMember = tostring(GroupMember), TenantGuid_g, Cloud_s;
let DirectAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    ServicePrincipals
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.SPNId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = 'Direct', Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
let GroupAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    GroupMemberships
    | join kind=inner ( 
        ServicePrincipals
    ) on $left.GroupMember == $right.SPNId
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.GroupId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = strcat('Group>',GroupName), Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
AppsAndKeys
| join kind=inner (ApplicationsInRisk) on ApplicationId_g
| summarize ExpiresOn = max(EndDate) by ApplicationId_g, DisplayName_s, Cloud_s, KeyType, TenantGuid_g
| join kind=leftouter (
    GroupAssignments
    | union DirectAssignments
) on ApplicationId_g
| summarize countif(isnotempty(RoleDefinition_s)) by DisplayName_s, ExpiresOn, KeyType, TenantGuid_g, ApplicationId_g
| order by countif_ desc

let AADObjectsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let RBACAssignmentsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let ServicePrincipals = materialize(AADObjectsTable
| where ApplicationId_g == '{selectedApp}'
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_g)
| where ObjectType_s == 'ServicePrincipal'
| project SPNId = ObjectId_g, ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s);
let GroupMemberships = AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
| where PrincipalNames_s startswith '['
| extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
| project-away PrincipalNames_s
| mv-expand GroupMember
| union (
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
    | where isnotempty(PrincipalNames_s) and PrincipalNames_s !startswith '['
    | extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
    | project-away PrincipalNames_s
)
| project GroupId = ObjectId_g, GroupName = DisplayName_s, GroupMember = tostring(GroupMember), TenantGuid_g, Cloud_s;
let DirectAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    ServicePrincipals
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.SPNId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = 'Direct', Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
let GroupAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| join kind=inner (
    GroupMemberships
    | join kind=inner ( 
        ServicePrincipals
    ) on $left.GroupMember == $right.SPNId
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.GroupId
| project ApplicationId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = strcat('Group>',GroupName), Model_s, TenantGuid_g;
GroupAssignments
| union DirectAssignments
| distinct DisplayName_s, ApplicationId_g, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment, Model_s
content.title: Roles assigned to application (selected above)

content.query:
let AADObjectsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let RBACAssignmentsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}) | where RoleDefinition_s in ({aadRoleDefinitions}));
let EnabledObjects = materialize(AADObjectsTable
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_g)
| where ObjectType_s == '{aadObjectType}' and SecurityEnabled_s in ('True','N/A')
| project ObjectId = ObjectId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, ObjectSubType_s);
let GroupMemberships = AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
| where PrincipalNames_s startswith '['
| extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
| project-away PrincipalNames_s
| mv-expand GroupMember
| union (
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
    | where isnotempty(PrincipalNames_s) and PrincipalNames_s !startswith '['
    | extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
    | project-away PrincipalNames_s
)
| project GroupId = ObjectId_g, GroupName = DisplayName_s, GroupMember = tostring(GroupMember), TenantGuid_g, Cloud_s;
let DirectUserAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| where Model_s == 'AzureAD'
| join kind=inner (
    EnabledObjects
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.ObjectId
| project PrincipalNames_s, PrincipalId_g, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = 'Direct', Model_s, TenantGuid_g, ObjectSubType_s;
let GroupUserAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| where Model_s == 'AzureAD'
| join kind=inner (
    GroupMemberships
    | join kind=inner ( 
        EnabledObjects
    ) on $left.GroupMember == $right.ObjectId
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.GroupId
| project PrincipalNames_s, PrincipalId_g, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = strcat('Group>',GroupName), Model_s, TenantGuid_g, ObjectSubType_s;
GroupUserAssignments
| union DirectUserAssignments
| distinct DisplayName_s, PrincipalNames_s, PrincipalId_g, ObjectSubType_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment
| order by PrincipalNames_s asc

let AADObjectsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}));
let RBACAssignmentsTable = materialize(AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where TenantGuid_g in ({TenantId}) | where RoleDefinition_s in ({armRoleDefinitions}));
let EnabledObjects = materialize(AADObjectsTable
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_g)
| where ObjectType_s == '{armObjectType}' and SecurityEnabled_s in ('True','N/A')
| project ObjectId = ObjectId_g, PrincipalNames_s, DisplayName_s, ObjectSubType_s);
let GroupMemberships = AADObjectsTable
| where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
| where PrincipalNames_s startswith '['
| extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
| project-away PrincipalNames_s
| mv-expand GroupMember
| union (
    AADObjectsTable
    | where ObjectType_s == 'Group' and SecurityEnabled_s == 'True'
    | where isnotempty(PrincipalNames_s) and PrincipalNames_s !startswith '['
    | extend GroupMember = parse_json(PrincipalNames_s)
    | project-away PrincipalNames_s
)
| project GroupId = ObjectId_g, GroupName = DisplayName_s, GroupMember = tostring(GroupMember), TenantGuid_g, Cloud_s;
let DirectUserAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| where Model_s == 'AzureRM'
| join kind=inner (
    EnabledObjects
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.ObjectId
| project PrincipalNames_s, PrincipalId_g, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = 'Direct', Model_s, TenantGuid_g, ObjectSubType_s;
let GroupUserAssignments = RBACAssignmentsTable
| where Model_s == 'AzureRM'
| join kind=inner (
    GroupMemberships
    | join kind=inner ( 
        EnabledObjects
    ) on $left.GroupMember == $right.ObjectId
) on $left.PrincipalId_g == $right.GroupId
| project PrincipalNames_s, PrincipalId_g, DisplayName_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment = strcat('Group>',GroupName), Model_s, TenantGuid_g, ObjectSubType_s;
GroupUserAssignments
| union DirectUserAssignments
| distinct DisplayName_s, PrincipalNames_s, PrincipalId_g, ObjectSubType_s, RoleDefinition_s, Scope_s, Assignment
| order by PrincipalNames_s asc

AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ObjectId_g == '{AADPrincipalId}'
| project PrincipalId = ObjectId_g, DisplayName_s
| join kind=inner ( 
    AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated {aadRoleHistoryRange:value} and Model_s == 'AzureAD'
    | project PrincipalId = PrincipalId_g, Scope_s, RoleDefinition_s, TimeGenerated
) on PrincipalId
| summarize RoleFirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated), RoleLastSeen = max(TimeGenerated) by DisplayName_s, Scope_s, RoleDefinition_s
| order by RoleLastSeen desc
content.title: Role history for selected principal

content.query:
AzureOptimizationAADObjectsV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ObjectId_g == '{ARMPrincipalId}'
| project PrincipalId = ObjectId_g, DisplayName_s
| join kind=inner ( 
    AzureOptimizationRBACAssignmentsV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated {armRoleHistoryRange:value} and Model_s in ('AzureRM','AzureClassic')
    | project PrincipalId = PrincipalId_g, Scope_s, RoleDefinition_s, TimeGenerated
) on PrincipalId
| summarize RoleFirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated), RoleLastSeen = max(TimeGenerated) by DisplayName_s, Scope_s, RoleDefinition_s
| order by RoleLastSeen desc
content.title: Role history for selected principal
